title: JSON schema for CDNJS client-side library

files.description: The file names of the individual files in the library to copy to the project. Don't specify to add all files.

id.description: The name of the library package as it exist on cdnjs.com

path.description: The relative folder path from this config file to the location where the library files should be copied to.

provider.description: The unique identifier of the provider
